channel.title: Training on Identity Managed
channel.description: Recent content in Training on Identity Managed

item.title: FIM Training backâ€”on May 23-26 in Phoenix
item.description: Last week I taught a group of students 50382A Implementing Forefront Identity Manager 2010, and referenced FIM Best Practices Volume 1 to supplement. It was a great bunch, full of humor. We even had one gentleman fly all the way from Australia to attend my class. I felt quite honored. Well due to popular demand we are going to run it again May 23-May 26 (M-Th) once more in downtown Phoenix.
